Class Coin

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObject
      • Coin

  • public class Coin
extends GameObject
    Class Coin represents coin objects during gameplay. Its functions is to be grabbed by player character for increasing score of the game.
    Author:
    kevingok

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Coin(Map map)
      Class constructor initializes width, height, image, animation for a mushroom with a map instance to reveal specified location on the map.
